MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA12 area of Irvine, affecting properties in Kirkgate and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to repairs to our underground electricity network  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33pm on Monday, 22 March 2021
